question: Was erythropoietin effective for optic neuritis in the TONE trial?
ideal_answer: No. Erythropoietin as an adjunct to corticosteroids conveyed neither functional nor structural neuroprotection in the visual pathways after optic neuritis.

snippets.text: INTERPRETATION: Erythropoietin as an adjunct to corticosteroids conveyed neither functional nor structural neuroprotection in the visual pathways after optic neuritis.
